title: Plat adc LFT that wants to improve and get good
body:
Plat 3 adc main looking to join a team thats semi serious and looking to improve play.
Free to play and practice 90% of the time, pretty good champ pool able to play all meta picks well, willing to play in tournaments and what not if teams want to.

If interested add me in game :)
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/308473
